name: e.l.f. Beauty, Inc.
description: e.l.f. Beauty, Inc. is a dynamic cosmetics company that specializes in innovative and affordable beauty products. Founded in 2004, e.l.f. has quickly become a favorite among consumers for its commitment to quality and value. The company offers a wide range of beauty products including makeup, skincare, and tools, all designed to be both accessible and high-performing. e.l.f. stands out in the beauty industry for its dedication to inclusivity and its mission to make beauty accessible to everyone, regardless of budget. With a focus on cruelty-free and vegan formulations, e.l.f. is also committed to sustainability and ethical practices. The company has embraced digital marketing and social media engagement, effectively reaching its millennial and Gen Z audience. e.l.f. Beauty’s innovative approach has led to a strong online presence and a growing retail footprint, with products available at major retailers and its own e-commerce platform. The brand continues to expand its product lines and collaborations, reflecting the latest beauty trends and consumer preferences. e.l.f. Beauty's vision is to empower individuals to express themselves creatively through beauty, making it a prominent player in the cosmetics industry.

seo.meta_title: e.l.f. Beauty, Inc. | Affordable Cosmetics & Beauty Products
seo.meta_description: Explore e.l.f. Beauty, Inc., a leader in affordable cosmetics and innovative beauty solutions. Discover our diverse range of products designed for all.

faq.question: What type of products does e.l.f. Beauty offer?
faq.answer: e.l.f. Beauty offers a wide range of cosmetics, skincare, and beauty tools.

faq.question: Is e.l.f. Beauty cruelty-free?
faq.answer: Yes, e.l.f. Beauty is committed to cruelty-free practices.

faq.question: Where is e.l.f. Beauty headquartered?
faq.answer: e.l.f. Beauty is headquartered in Oakland, California, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of e.l.f. Beauty?
faq.answer: Tarang P. Amin is the CEO of e.l.f. Beauty, Inc.
